channel.title: alert on After Dark
channel.description: Recent content in alert on After Dark

item.title: Alert
item.description: .margin-reset { margin: 0; } Quick Example Toggle alert styling. 1{{< hackcss-alert type="info" >}} 2 {{< hackcss-button 3 type="primary" text="Toggle" 4 onclick="this.parentElement.classList.toggle('alert')" 5 />}} alert styling. 6{{< /hackcss-alert >}} Default with plain text and hidden comment: {{< hackcss-alert text="Alert Text" />}} {{< hackcss-alert >}}Inner Alert Text{{< /hackcss-alert >}} {{< hackcss-alert text="Alert Text" >}}Hidden Comment{{< /hackcss-alert >}} Alert Text Inner Alert Text Alert Text Default with formatted text:
item.content:encoded: .margin-reset { margin: 0; } Quick Example Toggle alert styling. 1{{&lt; hackcss-alert type=&#34;info&#34; &gt;}} 2 {{&lt; hackcss-button 3 type=&#34;primary&#34; text=&#34;Toggle&#34; 4 onclick=&#34;this.parentElement.classList.toggle(&#39;alert&#39;)&#34; 5 /&gt;}} alert styling. 6{{&lt; /hackcss-alert &gt;}} Default with plain text and hidden comment: {{&lt; hackcss-alert text=&#34;Alert Text&#34; /&gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-alert &gt;}}Inner Alert Text{{&lt; /hackcss-alert &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-alert text=&#34;Alert Text&#34; &gt;}}Hidden Comment{{&lt; /hackcss-alert &gt;}} Alert Text Inner Alert Text Alert Text Default with formatted text: {{&lt; hackcss-alert &gt;}} &lt;strong&gt;HTML&lt;/strong&gt; Text {{&lt; /hackcss-alert &gt;}} {{% hackcss-alert %}}**Markdown** Text{{% /hackcss-alert %}} HTML Text Markdown Text Typed with plain and formatted text: {{&lt; hackcss-alert type=&#34;success&#34; text=&#34;Success Text&#34; /&gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-alert type=&#34;info&#34; &gt;}}&lt;s&gt;Info&lt;/s&gt; ~~Text~~{{&lt; /hackcss-alert &gt;}} {{% hackcss-alert type=&#34;warning&#34; %}}~~Warning~~ Text{{% /hackcss-alert %}} {{&lt; hackcss-alert type=&#34;error&#34; &gt;}} &lt;strong&gt;Error&lt;/strong&gt; Text {{&lt; /hackcss-alert &gt;}} Success Text Info ~~Text~~ Warning Text Error Text Typed with interactive Button and plain text: {{&lt; hackcss-alert type=&#34;info&#34; &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-button type=&#34;info&#34; isghost=&#34;true&#34; text=&#34;Toggle&#34; onclick=&#34;this.parentElement.classList.toggle(&#39;alert&#39;)&#34; /&gt;}} alert styling. {{&lt; /hackcss-alert &gt;}} Toggle alert styling. Inside a Card with a Button Group and two interactive Buttons: {{&lt; hackcss-card header=&#34;Card Title&#34; &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-alert type=&#34;success&#34; text=&#34;Congratulations! Your application was approved.&#34; /&gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-buttongroup &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-button text=&#34;Hide&#34; type=&#34;primary&#34; onclick=&#34;this.closest(&#39;.card&#39;).querySelector(&#39;.alert&#39;).hidden=true&#34; /&gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-button text=&#34;Show&#34; onclick=&#34;this.closest(&#39;.card&#39;).querySelector(&#39;.alert&#39;).hidden=false&#34; /&gt;}} {{&lt; /hackcss-buttongroup &gt;}} {{&lt; /hackcss-card &gt;}} Card Title Congratulations! Your application was approved. Hide Show Typed with HTML graphic and External link: {{&lt; hackcss-alert type=&#34;success&#34; &gt;}} &lt;img alt=&#34;Advertisement&#34; src=&#34;/images/products/nano-s.jpg&#34;&gt; {{&lt; external href=&#34;https://vhs.codeberg.page/nano-s&#34; class=&#34;muted&#34; &gt;}} &lt;small&gt;Ledger Nano S - The secure hardware wallet&lt;/small&gt; {{&lt; /external &gt;}} {{&lt; /hackcss-alert &gt;}} Ledger Nano S - The secure hardware wallet Containing a Card with six Progress indicators: {{&lt; hackcss-alert &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-card header=&#34;Value-added Tax by Country&#34; &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-progress value=&#34;16&#34; showpercent=&#34;true&#34; filltext=&#34;China – 增值税&#34; &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-progress value=&#34;20&#34; showpercent=&#34;true&#34; filltext=&#34;France – TVA&#34; &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-progress value=&#34;10&#34; showpercent=&#34;true&#34; filltext=&#34;Indonesia – PPN&#34; &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-progress value=&#34;8&#34; showpercent=&#34;true&#34; filltext=&#34;Japan – 消費税&#34; &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-progress value=&#34;15&#34; showpercent=&#34;true&#34; filltext=&#34;New Zealand – GST&#34; &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-progress value=&#34;20&#34; showpercent=&#34;true&#34; filltext=&#34;United Kingdom – VAT&#34; &gt;}} {{&lt; /hackcss-card &gt;}} {{&lt; /hackcss-alert &gt;}} Value-added Tax by Country
